devdoc.author: Babylon Finance Protocol 1Inch protocol trade integration

params._minReceiveQuantity: Min units of wanted token to be received from the exchange
params._receiveToken: Address of the token that will be received from the exchange
params._sendQuantity: Units of reserve asset token sent to the exchange
params._sendToken: Address of the token to be sent to the exchange

devdoc.title: 1InchTradeIntegration

getConversionRates(address,address,uint2.notice: Returns the conversion rate between the source token and the destination token in 18 decimals, regardless of component token's decimals hparam  _sourceToken        Address of source token to be sold hparam  _destinationToken   Address of destination token to buy hparam  _sourceQuantity     Amount of source token to sell

getName().notice: Returns the name of the integration

trade(address,address,uint256,address,ui.notice: Executes a trade on a supported DEX.
